channel.title: Process on Rasagy Sharma | Design Leader, Data Artist, Design Educator & Sketchnoter
channel.description: Recent content in Process on Rasagy Sharma | Design Leader, Data Artist, Design Educator & Sketchnoter

item.title: Visualizing 500 Days of Summer
item.description: This semester began with a module on Narratives, and when I got a chance to pick a topic for my Information Visualization module, I just had to visualize this movie’s non-linear narrative!

item.title: Week 1: Alberto Cairo’s MOOC on Infographics & Data Visualization
item.description: As an assignment, we had to pick one of the many infographics, critique it, & suggest alternatives to the infographic. Here’s my critique & some sketches.

item.title: Visualizing T.T. Finals at NID Bangalore
item.description: Last month, the (newly elected) sports committee of NID Bangalore organized a Table Tennis Tournament. Here’s my first attempt at making a data visualization – Final matches between Amal & Upamanyu.
